entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve `NormalizeWhitespace` for nested `fixed`/`using` statements without blocks #61518
  • A change for natural type of a UTF-8 string literal to `ReadOnlySpan<byte>` breaks several IDE tests #61517
  • Nullability warning disappears when commenting out *seemingly* unrelated code #61516
  • Consider filtering `RequiredMembers` attribute in compiler layer/API #61511
    C# 11.0
  • Local named "required" in top-level statements #61510
    C# 11.0
  • Document the best practice for getting text from a syntax in source generators #61506
  • [BUG] SymbolInfo resolution on double generic constraint method should return .Symbol but is null #61504
  • ReassignedVariable classifier crashed #61503
  • Usings via compilation options should bring source types into scope #61502
  • Defining System.Void in compilation suppresses error about usage of System.Void #61500

Closed

  • Roslyn looks to emit incorrect IL for `nuint -> double` and `nuint -> float` #60714
    17.3
  • Compiler StackOverflow #42361
  • Roslyn fails to take into account lifted operators' behavior resulting in false postivie nulalbility warnings #61361
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Add Move Static Member To Existing Type #61519
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify error handling and notifications in rename. #61515
    Area-IDE
  • Fix AbstractLanguageService constructor #61513
    Area-IDE
  • Unify the final state management processing in inline-rename. #61512
    Area-IDE
  • Fix setup authoring bug #61508
    Area-Compilers
  • Skip EndToEndTests.Constraints to unblock PRs #61507
    Area-Compilers
  • Add tool window #61499
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Adjust conversion from nuint to float/double #61345
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int, Next
  • Bring main-vs-deps back #61514
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Simplify rename implementation #61509
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Improvements to the background compiler component #61497
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Use assignabiilty instead of subclass test in extension loader #61505
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge 'main' to 'features/documentoutline' #61501
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add new background analysis scope option for compiler diagnostics #60808
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Lifted relational operator implies operands non-null when true #61403
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61498
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61520
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add opened and closed event handling for non-source documents #61377
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic Snippets - Remove reflection and call the LanguageServerSnippetExpander directly #61491
    Area-IDE
  • Update versions to use most recent LanguageServer changes. #61496
    Area-IDE
  • Support 'scoped' modifier for parameters and locals #61389
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Bind native integers in cref #61431
    Area-Compilers
  • IDE Support for Required Members #61440
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers
  • EnC: Allow adding/removing await expressions and yield statements #61356
    Area-Compilers, 17.3
  • Extract checking for generic constraint context to extension method #61485
    Area-IDE
  • Remove Utf8StringLiteral conversion #61481
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Reduce allocations in DirectMemoryAccessStreamReader.ReadToEnd #61351
    Area-IDE, Community
  • File types binding #60977
    Area-Compilers
  • Prepare VB iterators for EnC support #61488
    Area-Compilers
  • Add helper for source generators to filter to nodes with attribute matching an attribute name #61293
    Area-Compilers
  • Mask count in shift operations on native integers #61341
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int
  • Update 'Rename's commit behavior to be async. #61381
    Area-IDE
